tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (JJ real) (NNS friends)) (VP (ADVP (RB never)) (VBP leave) (NP (NP (FW u) (FW :-RRB-) (NN RT) (NN @__chocolate)) (: :) (S (VP (VBG realizing) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP$ your) (NN friend)) (VP (VP (VBD left) (NP (PRP you))) (VP (NP (NN RT) (FW di) (FW __)) (S (NP (NP (NNP LA) (NNP #HappinessIs)) (VP (VBG realizing) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (PRP$ your)))))))))))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [leave/VBP nsubj>[friends/NNS amod>real/JJ] neg>never/RB dobj>[@__chocolate/NN compound>u/FW compound>:-RRB-/FW compound>RT/NN punct>:/: dep>[realizing/VBG ccomp>[left/VBD mark>that/IN nsubj>[friend/NN nmod:poss>your/PRP$] dobj>you/PRP dep>[RT/NN compound>di/FW dep>__/FW xcomp>[#HappinessIs/NNP compound>LA/NNP acl>[realizing/VBG dep>[your/PRP$ mark>that/IN]]]]]]]]
